sentence: The  death  toll  from  Saturday's  attack  —  in  which  Hamas  militants  entered  Israel  from  Gaza  on  paragliders  and  broke  through  a  barrier  fence,  killing  and  kidnapping  people  —  has  reached  1,300.
Israel's  ongoing  retaliatory  offensive  on  the  Gaza  Strip  has  so  far  killed  1,500  Palestinians.
